text_block_list.text:
A few days after my encounter with Kawakami Princess. 
I went to the cafeteria to take a break, and saw the two combi 
I met a while ago.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, shouldn't we stop her?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yeah… she may be overdoing it.

The two of them are looking at the Kawakami Princess. 
She seems to be taking a break with a cup of tea―

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
My my…… tea cups are hard to hold. My fingers…… are 
trembling and―

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Aghhhhhh……! That was close. I must hold it like―.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ho-hohoho, as a princess, I should enjoy 
tea in the afternoon with elegance!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
……Something's wrong with Kawakami Senpai. Was she always 
like this?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
She must have had at least 20 cups of tea already. She is 
drinking too much and it looks bad for the body……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
On the contrary, she didn't eat at all. She use to gobble up 
huge amount of food……

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: As I recall, she said, 'Princesses are elegant and small eaters.'
choice_data_list: (Elegant…… come to think of it, the other day)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes! That's it! Elegance! A princess needs to be elegant 
after all.

She admires King Halo's sophisticated behavior. But if things 
those two said about her is true, it seems a bit excessive.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no! We've been chatting and didn't notice that 
Kawakami-senpai disappeared! Where did she go?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
……It can't be helped. We have practice to attend, 
so let's hear from her some other time.
The two walked away, but it made me worried as well.
choice_data_list: I should go find her.
I should go find her.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ubueeeeee…… my stomach is so full……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
No, I mustn't let this get the better of me! This is also a 
mission of a princess, for the sake of elegance……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Uppppu…… Hah～ ……
choice_data_list: Hi, Do you have a moment?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Uhyaa!? No, no, this is not what you think it is! 
I was not throwing up! I'm just right under the safety line!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……oh, oh my, It was you, trainer. Good afternoon……upps. 
It's a nice day isn't it.
choice_data_list: Take it easy……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Wh, what do you mean, "take it easy"? I was just taking an 
elegant stroll like a princess.
choice_data_list: You don't need to be elegant right now.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: What do you mean now?…… don't tell me you've noticed!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: That I'm in a training to become Elegant!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry for being so distraught. I didn't 
think anyone would notice my training.
choice_data_list: What…… is this training?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
It is, of course, the practice of acting elegantly 
like a princess. As a princess, I should be 
ladylike and graceful, shouldn't I?
choice_data_list: Like King Halo?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ―*Gasp!!

It seems I was right on target. Kawakami Princess 
looked disheartened.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'm surprised that I got exposed.…… Yes, I am. I'm training 
to be like King-san.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I have always admired the bravery of Princess Fighter. 
But when I came to the academy and met King-san―

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I realized that grace and elegance are what a princess needs! 
So, I, too, will imitate King-san and――
choice_data_list: What kind of imitation?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Let's see, for example, King-san doesn't skip 
up two flights of stairs, she doesn't chug soda, 
and she doesn't eat rice in a bowl……
choice_data_list: How did it go?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
It went…… actually not well at all. I don't know why 
I don't feel like I'm getting any closer to King-san……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
The Selection Race is coming up soon. I wonder if I can 
really become a princess at this state……

I understand what her problem is, but I feel like 
something is off. 
How do I get her to notice that―?
choice_data_list: Why don't we go see the woman herself again?
Why don't we go see the woman herself again?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
What, you mean King-san? ……? But I've already observed 
her so much.
choice_data_list: A book is worth reading again.
A book is worth reading again.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I guess I'm fine with it, if you say so……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ―…… phew!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh my～～, Look at that beauty!! Look at that figure! 
Those graceful movements!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Only a true King is able to run so elegantly! That's what an 
ideal princess looks like ……―ah!
(Zshaaa!!!)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……Ugh, not enough……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Amazing…… even when she fell, even when she's 
covered in mud, she didn't give up. 
How noble and beautiful……
choice_data_list: You didn't have to go that far, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I don't think so! I'm only going that far because I'm 
determined to be the best!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I decided to pursue my unwavering 'ideal' regardless of how 
people may see me! 
That's why you see, King-san always shines so brightl――y…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I see.…… King-san's nobility is something that comes 
from the inside……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That's why I couldn't get close to her.…… I only imitated 
the movements, but I was empty inside……

I felt uneasy as she nodded her head in a depressed manner. 
She says she is empty inside, but is that really true?
choice_data_list: You're just a bit lost that's all.
You're just a bit lost that's all.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Eh……?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Dreams are something you decide for yourself, and you 
have to reach them by yourself, right?
At the time, Kawakami Princess seemed to have a clear vision of the dream she was aiming for.
choice_data_list: I'm sure you had your own ideals.
You had your own ideals.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Really……? Not a copy of Princess Fighter's, and not a copy of 
King-san's, but my own……?
choice_data_list: Take your time to remember.
Take your time to remember.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… you're right. We still have time before the 
Selection Race……
choice_data_list: I'll be there to cheer you on.
I'll be there to cheer you on.

text_block_list.text:
Kawakami Princess nodded, but still looked anxious. She 
continued observing King Halo as she ran.
